entry.title: Angular SuperUI 2.0.0 - Major Release with 39+ Components
entry.summary: Angular SuperUI 2.0.0 features 39+ production-ready components with enhanced CLI and improved TypeScript support
entry.content:
We're excited to announce Angular SuperUI 2.0.0, our biggest release yet featuring 39+ production-ready components!

  • Performance: Tree-shakable, zero dependencies
